alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 17 at 9:41AM EDT until July 18 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:46 AM EDT Monday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain nearly steady at 11.2 feet. It`s expected to fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Mon 8 am: 11.2 Forecast: Mon 2 pm 11.2 Mon 8 pm 11.2 Tue 2 am 10.6 Tue 8 am 10.6 Tue 2 pm 7.9 Tue 8 pm 7.9 Wed 2 am 7.8 Wed 8 am 7.8 Wed 2 pm 9.0 Wed 8 pm 8.8 Thu 2 am 8.6 &&
